faq.title: Ceistean àbhaisteach (CÀBHA)
faq.intro: Air an duilleag seo, gheibh thu freagairtean air ceistean àbhaisteach mu Scratch.
faq.aboutScratchTitle: Dè th’ ann an Scratch agus dè nì mi leis?
faq.aboutScratchBody: ’S e bathar-bog agus coimhearsnachd air loidhne a th’ ann an Scratch far an urrainn dhut na sgeòil, geamannan agus beòthachaidhean eadar-ghnìomhach agad fhèin a chruthachadh -- agus na chruthaich thu a cho-roinneadh le càch air feadh an t-saoghail. Fad ’s a nì iad dealbhachadh is prògramachadh pròiseactan Scratch, ionnsaichidh òganaich mar a smaoinicheas iad gu cruthachail is gu rianail agus mar a dh’obraicheas iad còmhla. Airson barrachd fiosrachaidh mu Scratch, thoir sùil air an duilleag Mu Scratch.
faq.makeGameTitle: Ciamar a chruthaicheas mi geama no beòthachadh le Scratch?
faq.makeGameBody: Thoir sùil air duilleag na cobharach airson iomadh dòigh a shealltainn san urrainn dhut tòiseachadh le Scratch. No feuch ris sa bhad ann an deasaiche nam pròiseact.
faq.requirementsTitle: Dè riatanasan an t-siostam air a bhios Scratch feumach?
faq.requirementsBody: To run Scratch 2, you need to be using (1) a Mac, Linux, or Windows computer; (2) a version of Adobe Flash Player released on or after June 15, 2016; (3) a relatively recent web browser: one of the latest two versions of Chrome (Mac, Windows, or Linux), Firefox (Mac or Windows only), Safari (Mac or Windows only), Edge (Windows only), or Internet Explorer 10+ (Windows only). If your computer doesn’t meet these requirements, you can try downloading and installing Scratch 1.4, which you can still use to share projects to the Scratch 2 website. We do not support Chromium.
faq.offlineTitle: A bheil tionndadh dhe Scratch ann agad a ghabhas luchdadh a-nuas ach an cruthaich is seall mi air pròiseactan far loidhne?
faq.offlineBody: The Scratch 2 offline editor allows you to create Scratch projects without an internet connection. You can download Scratch 2 from the website. You can also still use Scratch 1.4. Note: You can have both Scratch 1.4 and 2 on your computer.
faq.uploadOldTitle: An urrainn dhomh pròiseactan a chaidh a chruthachadh le seann-tionndadh de Scratch a luchdadh suas dhan làrach-lìn fhathast?
faq.uploadOldBody: Yes - you can share or upload projects made with earlier versions of Scratch, and they will be visible and playable. (However, you can’t download projects made with or edited in later versions of Scratch and open them in earlier versions. For example, you can’t open a Scratch 2 project in Scratch 1.4, because Scratch 1.4 doesn’t know how to read the .sb2 project file format.)
faq.recordVideoTitle: An urrainn dhomh video a chlàradh dhen phròiseact Scratch agam?
faq.recordVideoBody: Yes, you can record a video of your Scratch project up to 60 seconds. In the Scratch editor, from the File menu, select "Record Project Video." (You need to be signed in to see this option.) You can choose additional recording options (such as recording sound and mouse clicks) through the "More Options" menu. Then, run your project however you'd like. Once the recording is done, follow the instructions to download the file to your computer. Depending on what kind of computer you have, you may need to download another program like the VLC Media Player to play the file. This file will run on YouTube, Vimeo, and Facebook, but may need to be converted for other websites like Twitter or Tumblr.
faq.scratchCostTitle: Dè na tha Scratch? A bheil feum agam air ceadachas?
faq.scratchCostBody: Tha agus bidh Scratch saor ’s an-asgaidh gu buan. Chan eil feum agad air ceadachas gus Scratch a chleachdadh san sgoil, san dachaigh no àite sam bith eile. Tha leasachadh is glèidheadh Scratch ga phàigheadh le tabhartasan is tìodhlacan. Nam bu toigh leat taic a chur ri Scratch, thoir sùil air an duilleag Thoir tìodhlac dhuinn.
faq.mediaLabBody: Tha Scratch ga leasachadh ’s ga ghlèidheadh leis an sgioba Scratch aig a’ bhuidheann Lifelong Kindergarten aig MIT Media Lab.
faq.accountInfoTitle: Dè am fiosrachadh a dh’iarras sibh orm nuair a chlàraicheas mi cunntas?
faq.accountInfoList: Gus a’ phrìobhaideachd aig buill a’ choimhearsnachd againn a dhìon, cuingichidh sinn na chruinnicheas sinn agus na dh’fhoillsicheas sinn air an làrach-lìn. Seo am fiosrachadh a dh’iarras sinn rè a’ chlàraidh:
faq.privacyUsername: ainm-cleachdaiche - Iarraidh sinn nach chleachd an luchd-cleachdaidh na dearbh-ainmean aca no fiosrachadh a dh’aithnicheadh iad air dòigh sam bith eile.
faq.privacyBirthdate: birth month and year - We use this to confirm ownership of the account if the owner loses the password and email or asks to close an account.
faq.privacyEmail: seòladh puist-d conaltraidh - Ma tha seilbheadair a’ chunntair nas òige na 13, iarraidh sinn seòladh puist-d pàraint no neach-glèidhidh. Cha chuir sinn post-d dhan t-seòladh ud ach nuair a dh’iarras cuideigin ath-shuidheachadh an fhacail-fhaire airson a’ chunntais.
faq.accountPublicInfo: Thèid an t-ainm-cleachdaiche agus an dùthaich aig sealbhadair a’ chunntais a shealltainn gu poblach air a’ phròifil aige. Cha tèid am mìos / bliadhna breith agus a’ ghnè a tha co-cheangailte ris a’ chunntas a shealltainn gu poblach. Cruinnichidh sinn am fiosrachadh seo ach am bi sinn eòlach air aois is gnè an luchd-cleachdaidh againn nan agragaid agus a chum rannsachaidh. Cha reic is cha toir sinn seachad fiosrachadh air mhàl mun luchd-cleachdaidh againn gu duine sam bith.
faq.dataCollectionTitle: Dè an dàta a thèid a chruinneachadh o dhaoine nuair a chleachdas iad an làrach-lìn?
faq.dataCollectionOne: Nuair a chlàraicheas cleachdaiche a-steach, iarraidh làrach-lìn Scratch air a’ bhrabhsair aige gun cuir e briosgaid http air a’ choimpiutair aige ach an cuimhnich e gu bheil e air a chlàradh a-steach fhad ’s a nì e brabhsadh air diofar dhuilleagan. Cruinnichidh sinn dàta slighe Google Analytics air càite a bhriogas an luchd-cleachdaidh agus dè na pàirtean dhen làrach-lìn air an tadhail iad. Cuidichidh an “dàta briogaidh” seo sinn ach an tuigeamaid ciamar a bheir sinn piseach air an làrach-lìn.
faq.dataCollectionTwo: Thèid cuid dhen fhiosrachadh agus dàta a chruinnicheas sinn air làrach-lìn Scratch a chleachdadh ann an rannsachadh gus piseach a thoirt air ar tuigse air ciamar a dh’ionnsaicheas daoine le Scratch. Thèid toraidhean an rannsachaidh seo a cho-roinneadh le luchd-foghlaim agus luchd-rannsachaidh ann an co-labhairtean, irisean is foillseachaidhean eile. Gheibh thu barrachd fiosrachaidh air an duilleag rannsachaidh.
faq.rentInfoTitle: An ann ’s gun reic no gun toir sgioba Scratch seachad fiosrachadh air mhàl mu luchd-cleachdaidh Scratch gu duine sam bith eile?
faq.viewUnsharedTitle: Am faic sgioba Scratch pròiseactan nach deach a cho-roinneadh air duilleag “An stuth agam”?
faq.viewUnsharedBody: Since the Scratch Team is responsible for moderation, we have access to all content stored on the Scratch website - including unshared projects. If you prefer to work on projects in complete privacy, you can use either the Scratch 2 offline editor or Scratch 1.4.
faq.remixDefinitionBody: Nuair a nì Neach-Scratch lethbhreac de pròiseact aig cuideigin eile agus ma dh’atharraicheas e e gus na beachdan aige fhèin a chur ris (can gun atharraich e sgriobt no aodach), cuiridh sinn “ath-mheasgachadh” air a’ pròiseact ud. Gabhaidh pròiseact sam bith a chaidh a cho-roinneadh air làrach-lìn Scratch co-mheasgachadh. Ar leinn tha gach atharrachadh bìodach na ath-mheasgachadh dligheach cho fad ’s a chaidh urram a thoirt air cruthadair a’ phròiseict thùsail agus air an fheadhainn a chur ris an ath-mheasgachadh air ìre mhath.
faq.remixableTitle: Carson a tha sgioba Scratch ag iarraidh gun gabh a h-uile pròiseact ath-mheasgachadh?
faq.remixableBody: Tha sinn dhen bheachd gur e deagh dhòigh a th’ ann gus prògramachadh ionnsachadh nuair a sheallas tu air pròiseactan inntinneach ’s nuair a nì thu co-mheasgachadh dhiubh agus gun tig sàr-bheachdan ùra às. Seo as adhbhar gun gabh am bun-tùs aig gach pròiseact a chaidh a cho-roinneadh air làrach-lìn Scratch a shealltainn.
faq.creativeCommonsTitle: Dè mur eil mi airson ’s gun co-roinn càch na pròiseactan agam?
faq.creativeCommonsBody: Nuair a cho-roinneas tu pròiseact a th’ agad air làrach-lìn Scratch, aontaichidh tu gun cuir thu e fo cheadachas Creative Commons Share Alike. Mur eil thu ag iarraidh gun seall is gun co-mheasgaich càch na chruthaich thu, na co-roinn e air làrach-lìn Scratch.
faq.fairUseTitle: Am faod mi dealbhan / fuaimean / meadhanan on eadar-lìon a chleachdadh sna pròiseactan agam?
faq.fairUseBody: Tha e cudromach gum bi meas agad air na thogras an cruthadair tùsail a thaobh ath-mheasgachadh. Ma chuireas tu romhad obair cuideigin eile a chur am broinn na h-obrach agad fhèin, dèan cinnteach gun toir thu urram dha ann an roinn “urram” a’ phròiseict agus gun cuir thu ceangal ris a’ phròiseact tùsail ann. Gus ealain / fuaimean a lorg aig a bhios ceadachas gus an ath-mheasgachadh, thoir sùil air duilleag luirg aig Creative Commons .
faq.confirmedAccountTitle: Dè th’ ann an cunntas Scratch air a “dhearbhadh”?
faq.confirmedAccountBody: A confirmed account on Scratch lets you share projects, write comments, and create studios. Confirming your account also lets you receive email updates from the Scratch Team.
faq.checkConfirmedTitle: How can I check whether my account has been confirmed?
faq.checkConfirmedBody: To check whether your account is confirmed, you must first log into your Scratch account in the top right of the screen. Once logged in, click on your username in the top right and select "Account Settings", then "Email Settings" on the left hand side. Confirmed email addresses will show a small green checkmark. Otherwise, you will see the text "Your email address is unconfirmed" in orange.
faq.howToConfirmTitle: Ciamar a dhearbhaicheas mi an cunntas agam?
faq.howToConfirmBody: After registering for Scratch, you will receive an email with a link to confirm your account. If you cannot find the email, check your Spam folder. To resend the email, go to your Account Settings, click the Email tab, and follow the instructions there. Please note that it may take up to an hour for the email to arrive. If you still don't see the email after an hour, let us know.
faq.requireConfirmTitle: A bheil agam ris an cunntas agam a dhearbhadh?
faq.requireConfirmBody: You can still use many aspects of Scratch without confirming your account, including creating and saving projects (without sharing them). Note: If you created an account before February 11, 2015, then you can still use social features on Scratch without confirming your account.
faq.forgotPasswordTitle: Dhìochuimhnich mi am facal-faire agam, ciamar a dh’ath-shuidhicheas mi e?
faq.forgotPasswordBody: Cuir a-steach ainm a’ chunntais agad air duilleag ath-shuidheachadh an fhacail-fhaire. Cuiridh an làrach-lìn post-d gun t-seòladh a tha co-cheangailte ris a’ chunntas agus bidh ceangal as urrainn dhut cleachdadh gus am facal-faire agad ath-shuidheachadh na bhroinn.
faq.changePasswordTitle: Ciamar a dh’atharraicheas mi am facal-faire agam?
faq.changePasswordBody: Rach gu làrach-lìn Scratch, clàraich a-steach agus an uair sin briog air an t-ainm-cleachdaiche agad san oisean deas aig barr na h-uinneige. Tagh “Roghainnean a’ chunntais” agus an uair sin briog air a’ cheangal gus am facal-faire agad atharrachadh.
faq.changeEmailTitle: Ciamar a dh’atharraicheas mi an seòladh puist-d agam?
faq.changeEmailBody: Rach gu làrach-lìn Scratch, clàraich a-steach agus an uair sin briog air an t-ainm-cleachdaiche agad san oisean deas aig barr na h-uinneige. Tagh “Roghainnean a’ chunntais” agus an uair sin briog air a’ cheangal gus an seòladh puist-d agad atharrachadh.
faq.newScratcherTitle: Ciamar a thèid mi nam “Neach-Scratch” o “Neach-Scratch ùr”?
faq.newScratcherBody: Cruthaich is co-roinn pròiseactan, cuir beachdan cuideachail ri pròiseactan Luchd-Scratch eile agus bi foighidinneach! Às dèidh beagan seachdainnean a ghnìomhachd, nochdaidh ceangal air duilleag na pròifil agad a bheir cuireadh dhut ach an tèid thu nad Neach-Scratch. (Thoir an aire nach àrdaich sinn Luchd-Scratch ùr nan Luchd-Scratch ri linn iarrtasan - fiù ’s ma bheireadh tu brìb teòclaid shnasail dhuinn.)
faq.multipleAccountTitle: Am faod iomadh cunntas a bhith agam?
faq.multipleAccountBody: Faodaidh iomadh cunntas a bhith agad air làrach-lìn Scratch cho fad ’s nach cleachd thu gin dhiubh gus Riaghailtean giùlain sa choimhearsnachd Scratch a bhriseadh. Ma bhriseas tu iad, faodaidh sinn a h-uile cunntas co-cheangailte a bhacadh no a sguabadh às.
faq.multipleLoginTitle: Am faod iomadh duine clàradh a-steach leis an aon chunntas?
faq.multipleLoginBody: Cha mholamaid seo on a thèid an làrach-lìn is deasaiche nam pròiseact na bhreisleach gu tric nuair a rinn iomadh duine clàradh a-steach leis an aon chunntas.
faq.changeUsernameTitle: An urrainn dhomh an t-ainm-cleachdaiche agam atharrachadh?
faq.changeUsernameBody: Tha structar làrach-lìn Scratch an eisimeil air ainmean chunntasan cunbhalach, mar sin cha ghabh an t-ainm-cleachdaiche agad atharrachadh. Ma tha cruaidh feum agad air, ’s urrainn dhut cunntas ùr a chruthachadh - ach feumaidh tu fhèin lethbhreac dhe na pròiseactan agad a chur a-nall.
faq.shareInfoTitle: Dè am fiosrachadh as urrainn dhomh a cho-roinneadh air / leis a’ chunntas agam?
faq.shareInfoBody: Na co-roinn fiosrachadh conaltraidh pearsanta, can an seòladh far a bheil thu a’ fuireach, an seòladh puist-d no an àireamh fòn agad no dad sam bith eile a ghabhadh cleachdadh gus conaltradh riut taobh a-muigh làrach-lìn Scratch. Dèan aithris air pròiseactan, beachdan no postaichean bùird-bhrath sa bheil an seòrsa seo de dh’fhiosrachadh ach an urrainn dhan sgioba Scratch a thoirt air falbh agus am poileasaidh againn a chuir an cuimhne an ùghdair.
faq.deleteAccountTitle: Ciamar a sguabas mi às an cunntas agam?
faq.deleteAccountBody: Clàraich a-steach air Scratch agus an uair sin briog air an t-ainm-cleachdaiche agad san oisean deas aig barr na h-uinneige. Tagh “Roghainnean a’ chunntais” agus an uair sin briog air a’ cheangal “Tha mi airson an cunntas agam a sguabadh às” aig bonn na duilleige.
faq.scratchFreeBody: Tha! Tha Scratch ri fhaighinn saor ’s an-asgaidh. ’S urrainn dhut a chleachdadh san sgoil agad agus faodaidh tu cùrsa a theagasg mu dhèidhinn (fiù ’s mas e an cùrsa air airgead a th’ ann). Cha leig thu leas ceadachas a cheannach - tha e an-asgaidh.
faq.scratchScreenshotTitle: Am faod mi Scratch agus / no glacaidhean-sgrìn de Scratch a chleachdadh ann an leabhar no CD?
faq.scratchScreenshotBody: Faodaidh, faodaidh tu fiù ’s leabhar no caibideil a sgrìobhadh mu Scratch. Faodaidh tu suaicheantas Scratch a chleachdadh cuideachd nuair a nì thu iomradh air Scratch. Faodaidh tu glacaidhean-sgrìn / dealbhan dhen aplacaid is dhen làrach-lìn Scratch a chruthachadh cuideachd cho fad ’s a chuireas tu iad fo cheadachas Creative Commons Attribution-ShareAlike. Tha sinn ag iarraidh ort gun cuir thu nòta ris an leabhar / CD / ge b’ e dè th’ ann ag innse “Tha Scratch ga leasachadh le buidheann Lifelong Kindergarten aig MIT Media Lab. Faic http://scratch.mit.edu”.
faq.scratchDescriptionTitle: Am faod mi tuairisgeul air Scratch agus suaicheantas Scratch a chur ri sanas-leabhranan agus stuth eile?
faq.scratchDescriptionBody: Faodaidh gu dearbh! Seo a tuairisgeul a mholamaid: “’S e bathar-bog agus coimhearsnachd air loidhne a th’ ann an Scratch far an urrainn dhut na sgeòil, geamannan agus beòthachaidhean eadar-ghnìomhach agad fhèin a chruthachadh -- agus na chruthaich thu a cho-roinneadh le càch air feadh an t-saoghail. Fad ’s a nì iad dealbhachadh is prògramachadh pròiseactan Scratch, ionnsaichidh òganaich mar a smaoinicheas iad gu cruthachail is gu rianail agus mar a dh’obraicheas iad còmhla. ’S e pròiseact aig a’ bhuidheann Lifelong Kindergarten aig MIT Media Lab a th’ ann an Scratch. Tha e ri fhaighinn saor ’s an-asgaidh air http://scratch.mit.edu”
faq.presentScratchTitle: Am faod mi Scratch a thaisbeanadh aig co-labhairt?
faq.presentScratchBody: Seall Scratch gu luchd-foghlaim is buidhnean eile air do thoil fhèin. Tha sinn a’ toirt cead dhut gus taisbeanaidhean a dhèanamh air.
faq.supportMaterialTitle: Am faod mi stuthan taice, sprìdean, dealbhan, fuaimean no buill-shampaill air pròiseactan Scratch a lorg mi air an làrach-lìn a chleachdadh / ath-mheasgachadh?
faq.supportMaterialBody: Faodaidh - Tha stuthan taice Scratch a chaidh a chur air an làrach-lìn Scratch le sgioba Scratch ach suaicheantas Scratch, cat Scratch Cat agus Gobo (comharran-malairt Scratch) ri am faighinn fo cheadachas Creative Commons Attribution-ShareAlike.
faq.sellProjectsTitle: An urrainn dhomh na pròiseactan Scratch agam a reic?
faq.sellProjectsBody: ’S urrainn gu dearbh - is tu fhèin a chruthaich na pròiseactan agad. Thoir an aire gum faod duine sam bith am pròiseact agad a luchdadh a-nuas, ath-mheasgachadh is ath-chleachdadh gu saor fo theirmichean ceadachas CC-BY-SA 2.0 turas a cho-roinneas tu air Scratch e. Mar sin, ma tha reic a’ phròiseict agad fainear dhut, dh’fhaodte nach bu toil leat a cho-roinneadh air Scratch tuilleadh.
faq.sourceCodeTitle: Càite an lorg mi bun-tùs Scratch?
faq.sourceCodeBody: The source code for the Scratch 2 editor can be found on GitHub. The source code for Scratch 1.4, written in Squeak, is also available on GitHub. For updated information on development projects relating to the Scratch website, please visit our Developer Page.
faq.okayToShareTitle: Ciamar a tha fios agam dè tha ceart gu leòr gus a cho-roinneadh air làrach-lìn Scratch?
faq.okayToShareBody: Thoir sùil air Riaghailtean giùlain sa choimhearsnachd Scratch - chan eil iad fada aghs chan eil torr cainnt laghail nam broinn. Tha ceangal air bonn gach duilleige air Scratch.
faq.reportContentTitle: Dè nì mi ma chì mi rudeigin nach eil iomchaidh?
faq.reportContentBody: ’S urrainn dhut briogadh air a’ cheangal “Dèan aithris“ air pròiseact, beachd, post na deasbaireachd no duilleag cleachdaiche sam bith ma tha thu dhen bheachd gu bheil rudeigin ann nach eil ceart airson Scratch. Ma tha an suidheachadh toinnte, ’s urrainn dhut an ceangal “Cuir fios thugainn” a cleachdadh gus a mhìneachadh. Dèan cinnteach gun gabh thu fiosrachadh mionaideach a-steach le ceanglaichean dha na duilleagan buntainneach.
faq.noFlameTitle: Dè nì mi ma chì mi gu bheil cuideigin mosach no mì-mhodhail?
faq.noFlameBody: Na cuir ris an teine! Cha tèid ach a h-uile rud a dholaidh ma fhreagras tu do bheachdan mosach le barrachd bheachdan mosach agus is dòcha gun tèid an cunntas agad a bhacadh air a shàilleibh. Cha leig thu leas ach aithris a dhèanamh air rud sam bith a tha mì-mhodhail no nach eil cuideachail agus bruidhnidh sinne ris an ùghdar. Bheir sinn sùil air na h-aithrisean iomadh turas gach latha - mar sin air do shocair, dèiligidh sinn ris.
faq.reviewContentTitle: Dè nì sgioba Scratch nuair a thèid rudeigin aithris no bratach a chur ris?
faq.reviewContentBody: Bheir an sgioba Scratch sùil air na beachdan is na pròiseactan a chaidh aithris dhaibh gach latha. Ma bhriseas rudeigin riaghailtean giùlain sa choimhearsnachd Scratch, faodaidh sinn a thoirt air falbh agus rabhadh a thoirt air a’ chunntas. A-rèir dè cho dona ’s a tha e (no ma thug sinn rabhadh air a’ chunntas roimhe), faodaidh sinn na cunntasan no lìonraidhean a chaidh a chleachdadh gus a cho-roinneadh a bhacadh cuideachd.
faq.blockedAccountTitle: Dè thachras nuair a chaidh cunntas a bhacadh?
faq.blockedAccountBody: Nuair a chaidh cunntas a bhacadh, chan urrainn dhan t-sealbhadair inntrigeadh no a chleachdadh gus pròiseactan no beachdan a chruthachadh tuilleadh. Nuair a chlàraicheas an neach a-steach, chì e duilleag a mhìnicheas carson a chaidh an cunntas a bhacadh le foirm-lìn leis as urrainn dha iarraidh gun tèid a dhì-bhacadh. Mas urrainn dhan t-sealbhadair a shealltainn gun do thuig e carson a chaidh an cunntas a bhacadh agus ma bheir e geall gun lean e air riaghailtean giùlain sa choimhearsnachd san àm ri teachd, bheir an sgioba Scratch sùil air a’ chùis a-rithist. Cha tèid cunntas a dhì-bhacadh ach ma chuireas sinn earbsa ann am facal an t-sealbhadair. Mura cuir, dh’fhaoidte gum bac sinn an cunntas (agus cunntasan eile aig an neach ud no a chruthaich e gun teagamh) gu buan.
faq.stolenAccountTitle: Ghoid mo bhràthair mosach / Kaj / droch dhuine eile an cunntas agam agus chaidh a thoirmeasg, dè nì mi a-nis?
faq.stolenAccountBody: ’S ann ortsa a bhios an t-uallach gun cum thu am facal-faire agad sàbhailte. Ma ghabhas cuideigin nad shaoghal smachd air a’ chunntas agad agus ma nì e droch-rudan, innis do na h-inbhich a stiùiricheas na coimpiutairean. Ma tha thu dhen bheachd gun d’ fhuair cuideigin nach aithne dhut smachd air a’ chunntas agad, atharraich am facal-faire agad agus / no cleachd an ceangal “Cuir fios thugainn" gus an suidheachadh a mhìneachadh. Ma chaidh do bhacadh air sàilleibh gnìomha a bhris riaghailtean giùlain sa choimhearsnachd, chan fhoghainn gun can thu gun deach briseadh a-steach air. Mur eil earbsa againn annad, cha dhì-bhac sinn thu.
faq.cloudDataInfoTitle: Dè th’ ann an dàta neòil?
faq.cloudDataInfoBody: ’S e gleus aig Scratch 2 a th’ anns an dàta neòil leis an urrainn dhut dàta o phròiseact a shàbhaladh ’s a cho-roinneadh rè ama. ’S urrainn dhut dàta neòil a chleachdadh gus suirbhidhean is pròiseactan eile a dhèanamh a ghlèidheas àireamhan rè ama.
faq.storedCloudInfoTitle: Cò chì an dàta tha ga ghlèidheadh san dàta neòil?
faq.storedCloudInfoBody: Nuair a nì thu eadar-ghnìomh le pròiseact a chleachdas blocaichean dàta neòil, dh’fhaoidte gun tèid am fiosrachadh agad a ghlèidheadh leis an ainm-chleachdaiche agad agus gum faic càch e. Cumaidh gach pròiseact loga air cò rinn eadar-ghnìomh leis agus air dàta sam bith a cho-roinn iad.
faq.onlyNumbersTitle: Carson nach eil ach àireamhan ceadaiche mar dhàta neòil – gun sreangan no liostaichean ann?
faq.onlyNumbersBody: Chan urrainn dhut ach àireamhan a chleachdadh ann an caochladairean air an làrach làithreach mar a’ chiad cheum gus duilgheadasan sam bith fhuasgladh a nochdas leis an cleachdadh air an làrach-lìn. Tha sinn ag amas gleusan dàta neòil a thoirt dhut mean air mhean. Ma tha am bun-structar ag obrachadh gu math, tha sinn an dùil barrachd ghleusan a thoirt dhut (liostaichean neòil, taic ri sreangan is msaa.).
faq.reportCloudTitle: Ma chì mi gun do phostaich cuideigin susbaint nach eil iomchaidh slighe dàta neòil, ciamar a nì mi aithris air?
faq.reportCloudBody: Briog air a’ phutan “Dèan aithris air” (aig bonn cluicheadair a’ phròiseict) gus susbaint neo-iomchaidh ann an dàta neòil aithris. Gabhaidh foirm na h-aithris a-steach ceangal gu loga sa bheil a h-uile dàta neòil sa pròiseact seo is fiosrachadh air cò a chuir an dàta ris - dh’fhaoidte gum bu toil leat sùil a thoirt air mus cuir thu an aithris agad. Dèan cinnteach gun cuir thu “cloud data” ris an adhbhar agad san aithris.
faq.chatRoomTitle: An urrainn dhomh seòmraichean-còmhraidh a dhèanamh le dàta neòil?
faq.chatRoomBody: Ged a ghabhas seòmraichean-còmraidh a dhèanamh le dàta neòil a thaobh teicneolais, chan eil iad ceadaichte aig an àm seo. Beachdaichidh sinn air a’ phoileasaidh seo a-rithist nuair a bhois barrachd eòlais againn air am biodh sinn comasach maoirsinneachd a dhèanamh orra agus air cumail suas ri aithrisean air dàta neòil.
faq.makeCloudVarTitle: Ciamar a chuireas mi caochladair neòil ris nuair a bhios mi a’ cruthachadh pròiseact?
faq.makeCloudVarBody: Nuair a chruthaicheas tu caochladair, ’s urrainn dhut cromag a chur sa bhogsa “Caochladair neòil”. Thèid gach dàta a ghlèidheas tu ann a shàbhaladh air an fhrithealaiche agus chì daoine eile e.
faq.changeCloudVarTitle: Cò as urrainn dhan fhiosrachadh ann an caochladair neòil atharrachadh?
faq.changeCloudVarBody: Chan urrainn ach dhan phròiseact agad fhèin dàta a ghlèidheadh sa chaochladair neòil aige. Ma dh’atharraicheas daoine an còd agad no ma nì iad ath-mheasgachadh air, cruthaichidh seo caochladair eile sa phròiseact acasan air a bheil an t-aon ainm.
faq.newScratcherCloudTitle: Tha mi air mo chlàradh a-steach ach chan urrainn dhomh pròiseactan le dàta neòil a chleachdadh fhathast. Dè as adhbhar?
faq.newScratcherCloudBody: Feumaidh tu bhith nad “Neach-Scratch” air an làrach-lìn mus faigh thu inntrigeadh do dhàta neòil. ’S urrainn dhut dol nad Neach-Scratch ma ghabhas tu pàirt sa choimhearsnachd air an làrach-lìn.
faq.multiplayerTitle: An urrainn dhomh geamannan ioma-chluicheadair a dhèanamh le dàta neòil?
faq.multiplayerBody: Cha chruthaich thu geama ioma-chluicheadair gun duilgheadas ri linn luaths lìonraidh is trioblaidean sioncronachaidh. Co-dhiù no co-dheth, lorg cuid dòighean cruthachail gus dàta neòil a cleachdadh airson geamannan suidhichte air cuairtean is eile.
faq.cloudLagTitle: Dè cho fada ’s a bheir e gus an ruig dàta neòil Neach-Scratch eile?
faq.cloudLagBody: Tha seo a’ crochadh air iomadh rud. Ma tha ceangal eadar-lìn reusanta luadh (DSL/càball) aig an dà each-Scratch agus mur eil cachaileith-theine a’ cuingeachadh na coimpiutairean/an lìonra, cha bu chòir ùrachadh a thoirt ach beagan mille-dhiog. Co-dhiù, tha cachaileith-theine a’ ruith air iomadh coimpiutair agus ma bhacas bathar-bog na cachaileith-teine ceanglaichean a-mach TCP port 531 agus TCP port 843, bith dàil de dhiog air. Tha sinn a’ fheuchainn ri dòighean a lorg gus an cuingeachadh seo fhuasgladh.
faq.howTitle: Ciamar a tha Scratch 'ga chleachdadh aig an sgoil?
faq.howBody: Scratch is used in thousands of schools around the world, in many different subject areas (including language arts, science, history, math, and computer science). You can learn more about strategies and resources for using Scratch in schools and other learning environments (such as museums, libraries, and community centers) on our Educators Page. You can also join the ScratchEd online community for educators, which is managed by our friends at the Harvard Graduate School of Education.
faq.ageTitle: Dè an aois iomchaidh airson Scratch?
faq.ageBody: Scratch was developed especially for young people 8 to 16 years old, so it is used most often in elementary schools and middle schools, but people of all ages create and share Scratch projects. Scratch is even used in some introductory computer-science courses in colleges. Younger children may want to try ScratchJr, a simplified version of Scratch designed for ages 5 to 7.
faq.noInternetTitle: Is there a way for students to use Scratch without an internet connection?
faq.noInternetBody: Yes. The Scratch Offline Editor is a version of Scratch that runs on a desktop or laptop computer. Currently, the Offline Editor is available for Mac and Windows machines.
faq.communityTitle: Can I turn off the online community for my students?
faq.communityBody: The Scratch online community provides a way for young people to share, collaborate, and learn with their peers within a moderated community governed by Community Guidelines. However, we understand that some educators prefer that their students not participate in an online community. These educators may wish to install the Scratch Offline Editor, which runs offline and locally on a desktop or laptop computer.
faq.teacherAccountTitle: What is a Scratch Teacher Account?
faq.teacherAccountBody: A Scratch Teacher Account provides teachers and other educators with additional features to manage student participation on Scratch, including the ability to create student accounts, organize student projects into studios, and monitor student comments.
faq.requestTitle: How do I request a Scratch Teacher Account?
faq.requestBody: You may request a Scratch Teacher Account from the Educators Page on Scratch. We ask for additional information during the registration process in order to verify your role as an educator.
faq.edTitle: What is the difference between a Scratch Teacher Account and a ScratchEd Account?
faq.edBody: Scratch Teacher Accounts are special user accounts on Scratch that have access to additional features to facilitate the creation and management of student accounts. ScratchEd Accounts are accounts on the ScratchEd community, a separate website (managed by the Harvard Graduate School of Education) where educators share stories, exchange resources, ask questions, and meet other Scratch educators.
faq.dataTitle: What data does Scratch collect about students?
faq.dataBody: When a student first signs up on Scratch, we ask for basic demographic data including gender, age (birth month and year), country, and an email address for verification. This data is used (in aggregated form) in research studies intended to improve our understanding of how people learn with Scratch. When an educator uses a Scratch Teacher Account to create student accounts in bulk, students are not required to provide an email address for account setup.
faq.lawComplianceTitle: Is Scratch 2.0 (online version) compliant with United States local and federal data privacy laws?
faq.lawComplianceBody: Scratch cares deeply about the privacy of students and of all individuals who use our platform. We have in place physical and electronic procedures to protect the information we collect on the Scratch website. Although we are not in a position to offer contractual guarantees with each entity that uses our free educational product, we are in compliance with all United States federal laws that are applicable to MIT, a 501(c)(3) organization and the entity that created and maintains Scratch. We encourage you to read the Scratch Privacy Policy for more information.
faq.schoolsMoreInfo: For more more questions about Teacher Accounts, see the Teacher Account FAQ
